summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department, providing for the construction of that portion of the West Marginal Way South comprehensive storm drain trunk system which includes 16th Avenue SW from SW Morgan Street to SW Graham Street, SW Graham Street from 16th Avenue SW to 17th Avenue SW, 17th Avenue SW from SW Graham Street to SW Brandon Street, SW Brandon Street from 17th Avenue SW to 18th Avenue SW, 18th Avenue SW from SW Brandon Street to SW Hudson Street, SW Juneau Street and an easement extending from 16th Avenue SW to 17th Avenue SW, and SW Hudson Street from 18th Avenue SW to a point in Puget Park; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the City Street Fund therefor.
